reviews.review: Reward loop is nonexistent. Gameplay is perfect.

Nfts from 2008, just what i needed.

Each and every time I attempt to play this game, the community within it literally makes me lose my faith in humanity. Even in my first few matches of competitive where I'm trying to learn the basics of how to improve, all I've witnessed are people acting like cun≈ßs and it's very distracting within a "team-based shooter."

So instead of trying to put up with folks who have to act tough online because they're oppressed in reality, I'm just going to conserve my brain cells and simply walk away. If you want a PVP shooter where the community isn't as terrible, check out Insurgency instead.
